    • aReply

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> aReply​(ReActorRef sender, java.io.Serializable anyPayload)
      Reply sending a message to the sender of the last message processed by this reactor using ReActorRef.aTell(Serializable)
      Parameters:
      sender - ReActorRef identifying the sender of this reply
      anyPayload - payload to be sent
      Returns:
      a CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> returned by ReActorRef.aTell(ReActorRef, Serializable)

    • selfTell

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> selfTell​(java.io.Serializable anyPayload)
      ReActorRef.tell(Serializable) to the current reactor the specified message setting itself as sender for the message
      Parameters:
      anyPayload - message that should be self-sent
      Returns:
      A CompletionStage<Try<DeliveryStatus>> returned by ReActorRef.tell(Serializable) complete
